News.headline: Scott Doe Signs Contract Extension
News.short_description: The Daggers are delighted to announce that defender Scott Doe has signed a one year contract extension with the club.
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that defender and Daggers captain Scott Doe has signed a one year extension on his current contract.Â 

The defender re-signed for the Daggers in the summer after one season away at Boreham Wood and has made 29 appearances for the club so far this season, after making 263 appearances in his previous spell at the Daggers from February 2009 until July 2015.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on all Club news:
